ygData.subject: Re: Pie tins and skewers.....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Easier said than done, I ve tried countless times on Bertoxxulous to have someone smith me a pie tin, and every time it comes up lame.  Everyone wants
ygData.messageBody:
> > Let's start petitioning for pie tins. We can get
> > skewers from the shops in Ak'anon (at least I
> did).
> > But Pie Tins are no where to be found.
>
> It's actually Cheaper to buy them from PC's. Find
> someone that can make
> them and pay to have some made. It's what I do.


Easier said than done, I've tried countless times on
Bertoxxulous to have someone smith me a pie tin, and
every time it comes up lame. Everyone wants countless
amounts of cash, and I don't even know if my forumla
is going to work! I'm not going to pay 1.5pp for
equipment and 1pp for a smith, only to have it fail.

Understand my gripe?
